channel.title: [508] HappyPkScapev6 edited [508]
channel.description:
Hi, i am re-releasing HappyPkScapev6, but with a few fixes....
PLEASE POST! OR I WILL JUST REMOVE AND CONTINUE WORKING ON IT!
Note: This server was not created by me, I just fixed 8+ Bugs/Glitches in the server that i think were really messing up the source. This is in no way making a profit for me, nor' will i accept any profit from re-releasing this source made by HappyPk ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- First Things First!!!
[size=12pt][B][U]CREDITS:[/U][/B][/size] 80%[B] HappyPk[/B] (The Actual Server!) 10% [B]Me[/B] (Fixing Glitches, Trading, and adding quite a few things!) 1% [B]Gravediggah[/B] (His Trading Tutorials) 3% [B]Disastercal[/B]l (Highscore Tutorials) 6% [B]lildude78[/B]4 (Helping me with Server Errors along the way)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=12pt][B][U]New Version:[/U][/B][/size] Highscores 90% Setup, You just have to move the "highscores" file Grand Exchange 80% (Just doesn't save offers when you server shuts off) Trading is 90% Fixed (Offer 1, offer 5, offer 10, offer all) Dragon Claws special added! D Claws Added into server (no more rune claws description) D Claws Wieldable! Added Kick Command Removed IpSpam after IpBanned (a Few names are changed about the server, sorry its GZ Revived) Max Level raised to 138 Ranging Farcast Fixed (Upcoming: Mage On Npc's!) Rid of All Perfect Items (Add them back if you want) Changed shop interfaces to "ShopHandler.java" && "Shops.java"
Images: (Sorry None Yet, Moparscape wont let me use r(u)ne(l)0cus images..... and i cannot use photobucket..)
Edit: For Highscores, I Added a .txt Document in there, on what you should do to get them perfectly setup to a no-ip.*** Adress..lolking
Edit: Removed All Ip Connections, banned users, banned hosts, characters , and any other server-connection Relations.
[B][U]I Am still working on the server, if you have any suggestions, just post them here![/U][/B]
Download Link!! ----------------------------------------------- [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/v/hbrswmt9"]http://uppit.com/v/hbrswmt9[/URL] [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/v/hbrswmt9"]http://uppit.com/v/hbrswmt9[/URL] [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/v/hbrswmt9"]http://uppit.com/v/hbrswmt9[/URL]
[U]Note[/U]: This server was not created by me, I just fixed 8+ Bugs/Glitches in the server that i think were really messing up the source. This is in no way making a profit for me, nor' will i accept any profit from re-releasing this source made by HappyPk

item.title: [508] HappyPkScapev6 edited [508]
item.dc:creator: @ThatCrackerZach ThatCrackerZach
item.description:
@ThatCrackerZach wrote:

Hi, i am re-releasing HappyPkScapev6, but with a few fixes…

PLEASE POST!
OR I WILL JUST REMOVE AND CONTINUE WORKING ON IT!

Note: This server was not created by me, I just fixed 8+ Bugs/Glitches
in the server that i think were really messing up the source. This is in no
way making a profit for me, nor’ will i accept any profit from re-releasing
this source made by HappyPk

First Things First!!!

[size=12pt]CREDITS:[/size]
80% HappyPk (The Actual Server!)
10% Me (Fixing Glitches, Trading, and adding quite a few things!)
1% Gravediggah (His Trading Tutorials)
3% Disastercall (Highscore Tutorials)
6% lildude784 (Helping me with Server Errors along the way)

[size=12pt]New Version:[/size]
Highscores 90% Setup, You just have to move the “highscores” file
Grand Exchange 80% (Just doesn’t save offers when you server shuts off)
Trading is 90% Fixed (Offer 1, offer 5, offer 10, offer all)
Dragon Claws special added!
D Claws Added into server (no more rune claws description)
D Claws Wieldable!
Added Kick Command
Removed IpSpam after IpBanned
(a Few names are changed about the server, sorry its GZ Revived)
Max Level raised to 138
Ranging Farcast Fixed
(Upcoming: Mage On Npc’s!)
Rid of All Perfect Items (Add them back if you want)
Changed shop interfaces to “ShopHandler.java” && “Shops.java”

Images:
(Sorry None Yet, Moparscape wont let me use r(u)ne(l)0cus images…
and i cannot use photobucket…)

Edit: For Highscores, I Added a .txt Document in there, on what you should
do to get them perfectly setup to a no-ip.*** Adress…lolking

Edit: Removed All Ip Connections, banned users, banned hosts, characters
, and any other server-connection Relations.

I Am still working on the server, if you have any suggestions, just post them here!

Download Link!!

http://uppit.com/v/hbrswmt9
http://uppit.com/v/hbrswmt9
http://uppit.com/v/hbrswmt9

Note: This server was not created by me, I just fixed 8+ Bugs/Glitches
in the server that i think were really messing up the source. This is in no
way making a profit for me, nor’ will i accept any profit from re-releasing
this source made by HappyPk
